welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glenvar Heights! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality and charm of our city, known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Glenvar Heights has to offer."

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: Serves mainly international flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at North Perry Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private flights and offers exclusive amenities for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private aircraft operations.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private aviation and offers luxurious amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.
